user_query: What are different perspectives on climate change policies

strategy_used: Graph Strategy: We are at the start of the investigation and need to close core information gaps: (1) what policy frames and terms are active on Twitter, (2) which stakeholders and accounts drive each frame, and (3) representative tweets/threads that illustrate distinct perspectives. The next round should therefore combine broad topical search, trend signals, and direct timelines from influential accounts representing different viewpoints. This mix (search + trends + timelines) satisfies the requirement to use diverse endpoints and produces complementary outputs for systematic follow-up (conversation analysis, network mapping, credibility checks).
